siteMetadata.title: vwa.la help
siteMetadata.description: Everything you need to know about the vwa.la influencer marketing platform.

markdownRemark.html:
Is referral, affiliate and influencer marketing the same thing?

Yep, that's right.

Referral/affiliate/influencer marketing bascially mean the same thing. There are subtle differences, but they are trivial in practice. So feel free to use whichever term suits your brand the best!
